snippet: The congressman’s camp denies allegations made by his challenger that Mr. Rangel endorsed the deportation of immigrants.
abstract: Camp for Rep Charles B Rangel denies allegations made by State Sen Adriano D Espaillat, his challenger in Democratic primary, that Rangel endorsed the deportation of immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The congressman’s camp denies allegations made by his challenger that Mr. Rangel endorsed the deportation of immigrants.

headline.main: Rangel’s Top Rival Stirs Up Deportation Debate
headline.print_headline: Rangel’s Rival Stirs Up Deportation Debate
